info.title: Read information about a spin button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSpinButtonAndSetPredefinedDate
setupScript.description: sets the date picker to March 19, 2021, and sets focus on the 'Day' spin button

user: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, read information about the button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, read information about the button.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
